subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|くりや}}

Originally a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=くりや|涅|tr1=kuri|t1=[[black]]; [[dark]]-[[color|colored]]|pos1=cognate with {{m|ja|黒|tr=kuro||black}}; in reference to the darkening of the walls from soot from cooking fires|屋|tr2=ya|t2=[[house]]; [[shed]]}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Synonyms
subSections.text: * {{sense|kitchen}} {{ja-r|台%所|たい%どころ}}, {{ja-r|台%所|たい%どこ}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|ちゅう}}

From {{der|ja|ltc|sort=ちゆう|-}} {{ltc-l|廚}}. The ''{{ll|ja|漢音|kan'on}}'' pronunciation, so likely a later borrowing.

subSections.title: Synonyms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|庖%厨|ほう%ちゅう}}
* {{ja-r|厨%房|ちゅう%ぼう}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Only found in compounds, never in isolation.

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|ちゅう}}

A punning phonetic use based on {{m|ja|中坊|tr=chūbō||middle school student, noob|pos=derogatory}}, a homophone of {{m|ja|厨房|tr=chūbō||kitchen}}.
